html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %} {% set company_doc = frappe.get_doc("Company", doc.company) %}

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.offer_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }}

To,
{{ doc.applicant_name }}
{% if doc.applicant_email %}{{ doc.applicant_email }}
{% endif %}

Subject: Offer of Employment - {{ doc.designation }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to offer you the position of {{ doc.designation }} with {{ doc.company }}. We believe your skills and experience will be valuable additions to our team.

Terms and Conditions of Employment:

1. Position and Reporting

  • Designation: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Department: {{ doc.custom_department or '[Department Name]' }}
  • Reporting Manager: {{ doc.custom_supervisor_name or '[Manager Name and Designation]' }}
  • Work Location: {{ doc.custom_work_location or '[Office Address/Remote/Hybrid]' }}

2. Compensation and Benefits

  • Annual CTC: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_annual_ctc or 0) }} per annum
  • Monthly Gross Salary: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_monthly_gross_salary or 0) }}
  • Basic Salary: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_basic_salary or 0) }}
  • House Rent Allowance (HRA): ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_hra or 0) }}
  • Special Allowance: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_special_allowance or 0) }}
    • {% if doc.custom_professional_dev_allowance %}
  • Professional Development Allowance: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_professional_dev_allowance) }}
    • {% endif %}

3. Deductions

  • Provident Fund (PF): As per statutory requirements (12% of basic salary)
  • Employee State Insurance (ESI): As applicable
  • Professional Tax: As per state regulations
  • Income Tax (TDS): As per Income Tax Act, 1961

4. Additional Benefits

  • Medical Insurance coverage as per company policy
  • {{ doc.custom_other_benefits or '[Other benefits like meal allowance, transport allowance, etc.]' }}
  • Annual leave as per company policy
  • Sick leave as per company policy

5. Employment Terms

  • Employment Type: Permanent/Full-time
  • Probation Period: {{ doc.custom_probation_period or '[X]' }} months from the date of joining
  • Notice Period: {{ doc.custom_notice_period or '[X]' }} days/months as per company policy
  • Working Hours: {{ doc.custom_work_schedule or '[X] hours per day, [X] days per week' }}
  • Date of Joining: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.custom_joining_date or doc.offer_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }}

6. Confidentiality and Non-Disclosure

You will be required to sign a confidentiality agreement and adhere to company policies regarding proprietary information and intellectual property.

7. Compliance

This offer is subject to:

  • Verification of documents and background check
  • Medical fitness certificate (if required)
  • Compliance with all applicable labor laws including the Industrial Employment (Standing Orders) Act, 1946
  • Adherence to company code of conduct

8. Termination

Either party may terminate this employment by giving {{ doc.custom_notice_period or '[X]' }} days/months written notice or payment in lieu thereof, subject to applicable labor laws.

This offer is valid until {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.custom_offer_valid_until or doc.offer_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }}. Please confirm your acceptance by signing and returning this letter along with the required documents.

We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Yours sincerely,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

Acceptance:

I, {{ doc.applicant_name }}, accept the above terms and conditions of employment.

Signature: _________________

Date: _________

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.contract_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }}

To,
{{ doc.contractor_name }}
{% if doc.contractor_email %}{{ doc.contractor_email }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.contractor_address %}{{ doc.contractor_address }}
{% endif %}

Subject: Contract for Services - {{ doc.project_service_description }}

Dear {{ doc.contractor_name }},

We are pleased to engage your services as an independent contractor for {{ doc.company }} for the project/services described below.

Contract Terms and Conditions:

1. Scope of Work

  • Project/Service: {{ doc.project_service_description }}
  • Detailed Scope: {{ doc.scope_of_work or '[Detailed description of work]' }}
  • Deliverables: {{ doc.deliverables or '[Specific deliverables and timelines]' }}
  • Duration: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.start_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }} to {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.end_date, "dd-mm-yyyy") }}
  • Work Location: {{ doc.work_location or '[Location/Remote]' }}

2. Compensation

  • Total Contract Value: ₹{{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.total_contract_value or 0) }}
  • Payment Terms: {{ doc.payment_terms or '[Monthly/Milestone-based/Upon completion]' }}
  • Payment Schedule: {{ doc.payment_schedule or '[Specific payment dates]' }}
  • Tax Implications: {% if doc.tds_applicable %} TDS as per Income Tax Act, 1961 ({{ doc.tds_rate or 'applicable' }}% rate) {% else %} TDS as per Income Tax Act, 1961 (applicable rates) {% endif %}
    • {% if doc.gst_applicable %}
  • GST: GST as per applicable rates
    • {% endif %}

3. Independent Contractor Status

  • You shall work as an independent contractor and not as an employee
  • No employment relationship is created by this agreement
  • You are responsible for your own taxes, insurance, and statutory compliances
  • No employee benefits (PF, ESI, gratuity) are applicable

4. Intellectual Property Rights

{% if doc.ip_rights_clause %} {{ doc.ip_rights_clause }} {% else %}
  • All work products, inventions, and deliverables created under this contract shall be the exclusive property of {{ doc.company }}
  • You shall execute necessary documents to transfer IP rights to the company
{% endif %}

5. Confidentiality and Non-Disclosure

{% if doc.confidentiality_clause %} {{ doc.confidentiality_clause }} {% else %}
  • Strict confidentiality of all proprietary information
  • Non-disclosure of client information and business processes
  • Return of all company materials upon contract completion
{% endif %}

6. Performance Standards

{% if doc.performance_standards %} {{ doc.performance_standards }} {% else %}
  • Work to be completed as per agreed specifications and timelines
  • Regular progress reporting as mutually agreed
  • Adherence to company quality standards
{% endif %}

7. Termination

  • Either party may terminate with {{ doc.notice_period_days or '[X]' }} days written notice
  • Immediate termination for breach of contract terms
  • Payment for completed work up to termination date

8. Legal Compliance

  • Compliance with applicable laws including GST regulations
  • This contract is governed by Indian Contract Act, 1872
  • Jurisdiction: {{ doc.jurisdiction or '[City]' }} courts

9. Amendments

{{ doc.amendment_clause or 'Any modifications to this contract must be in writing and signed by both parties.' }}

{% if doc.additional_terms %}

10. Additional Terms

{{ doc.additional_terms }}
{% endif %}

Please sign and return this letter to confirm your acceptance of these terms.

We look forward to a successful collaboration.

Yours sincerely,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

Acceptance:

I, {{ doc.contractor_name }}, accept the above terms and conditions of this contract.

Signature: _________________

Date: _________
